trailingComments.value: To avoid `EISDIR` error on Mac and `EACCES`-->`ENOENT` and `EPERM` on Windows.

leadingComments.value: Throw the original parentDir error on `current` `ENOENT` failure.
To avoid `EISDIR` error on Mac and `EACCES`-->`ENOENT` and `EPERM` on Windows.

trailingComments.value: Throw if it's just the last created dir.

comments.value: To avoid `EISDIR` error on Mac and `EACCES`-->`ENOENT` and `EPERM` on Windows.
Throw the original parentDir error on `current` `ENOENT` failure.
Throw if it's just the last created dir.
